text.text:
:feather: *Decretum Officium — Senate Proclamation I*
*“The Roman Theme Mandate”*
By decree of Imperator Visio Maximus,
Let it be known:
• *System Navigation*: `#A50000` (Imperial Legionary Red)
• *Selected Items*: `#E6C8B3` (Parchment of the Senate)
• *Presence*: `#4CAF50` (Laurel of Activity)
• *Notifications*: `#D4AF37` (Imperial Gold of Distinction)

Ave Slackus. Ave Imperium. Ave US Reliance.
